llmSegmentedChunks.chunkText: If late or absent, please notify Luisa so she isn't waiting unnecessarily.

Troubleshooting & Support Invalid Address? Bot prompts you to enter: ● Street number ● Street name ● Suburb ● Postcode No services or times available? Bot informs you and offers: ● Alternative day suggestions ● Button to contact support What if I ask a question mid-booking? The bot will answer and then resume where you left off, re-showing the next step or buttons.
Let me know when you're ready to incorporate more business context (like staff, promos, or seasonal offerings), or if you want to generate a JSON or structured format for the bot backend.
